name: Eternis, the CyPolice Citadel of Justice
text: "CyPolice" Link Monsters cannot be destroyed by battle with other Link Monsters. Once per turn, if your "CyPolice" Link Monster is destroyed by an opponent's card effect: You can target 1 non-Link "CyPolice" monster in your GY; shuffle it into your Deck, or, if you control no monsters, you can add it to your hand instead.
